title: Strangers of the Night
description: Halloween in Eastwood is not like any other town.Monsters hide around every corner. Dressed in your darkest fantasy.Catalina thought she was safe hiding in the cemetery. Except she was mistaken. When three strangers find her, they kidnap her and give her pleasure she didn't know existed.She was only supposed to be theirs for the night. That's until they revealed their true identity to her. That's when things take a turn.They wanted her forever.*Written in Canadian English*
author: C.L. Easton
